text: Password Management Overview There are three actions performed by the CPM in order to manage privileged accounts: ) Password Verification: Confirms the password stored in the Vault matches the password on the target system @ Password Change: Changes the password automatically based upon an expiration period or by user intervention © Reconciliation of unknown or lost passwords: Process used when the password stored in the Vault does not match the target system — = - go=se o —r Central Policy IT Environment Manager —
